description:
The NeuroPilot extension allows for more complex configurations through the .neuropilot/ folder as opposed to dealing with editing .vscode/settings.json directly.
Extensions can also use the .neuropilot/ folder and give a schema for it via the `jsonValidation` contribution point.
The standard for doing that is either adding a new schema to config.json following the base.settings.schema.json file in NeuroPilot, or using a subfolder within .neuropilot/ for more complex configurations.
